recipe.title: Cajun-Style Chicken Salad Recipe by Tasty

steps.step: In a small bowl, combine paprika, cayenne, garlic powder, oregano, thyme, and salt. Reserve 1½ teaspoons of the seasoning. Set aside.
Coat both sides of the chicken breasts with the seasoning mixture.
In an oiled cast-iron skillet, cook chicken on medium-high heat 4 minutes per side, or until chicken is browned.
Bake for 15-20 minutes, or until the internal temperature of the chicken reaches 165˚F (72˚C). Let the chicken rest for several minutes.
In a small bowl, combine yogurt, minced garlic, lime juice, olive oil and reserved seasoning mixture. Set aside.
In a large bowl, add lettuce, chicken, red onion, avocado, cherry tomatoes, and black beans.

steps_updated.steps_updated: In a small bowl, combine paprika, cayenne, garlic powder, oregano, thyme, and salt.
Coat both sides of the chicken breasts with the seasoning mixture.
In an oiled cast-iron skillet, cook chicken on medium-high heat 4 minutes per side, or until chicken is browned.
Bake for 15-20 minutes, or until the internal temperature of the chicken reaches 165˚F (72˚C).
Let the chicken rest for several minutes.
In a small bowl, combine yogurt, minced garlic, lime juice, olive oil and reserved seasoning mixture.
In a large bowl, add lettuce, chicken, red onion, avocado, cherry tomatoes, and black beans.
